div.p: This code system https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/NIHSS2Gaze defines the following codes:

tr.td: Partial gaze palsy; gaze is abnormal in one or both eyes, but forced deviation or total gaze paresis is not present.
Forced deviation, or total gaze paresis not overcome by the oculocephalic maneuver.

title.value: The National Institute of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) - 2. Best Gaze

publisher.value: Sundhedsvæsenets Kvalitetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

name.value: Sundhedsvæsenets Kvalitetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

description.value: The National Institute of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) - 2. Best Gaze; Link: https://www.ninds.nih.gov/stroke-scales-and-related-information

definition.value: Partial gaze palsy; gaze is abnormal in one or both eyes, but forced deviation or total gaze paresis is not present.
Forced deviation, or total gaze paresis not overcome by the oculocephalic maneuver.
